show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
Today on Connect the Dots at 10 AM ET in Kate Davies: The Rise of the US Environmental Health Movement, Alison Roseâ€¦ Levy speaks with professor and advocate Kate Davies, author of the new book, The Rise of the US Environmental Health Movement about the evolution of environmental awareness and concern.
